body:
I propose adding a new environment variable, `KUBE_BUILD_VERBOSE`, which gives the current output (and is enabled for jenkins builds). Without that flag, errors should be immediately obvious, and the output should fit on a single terminal screen.

Here is a sample of output from an error caused by a stray character in `kubelet.go`:

```
$ make kubelet
Go version: go version go1.6.2 linux/amd64
+++ [0804 16:04:25] Generating bindata:
    /usr/local/google/home/stclair/go/k8s3/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/framework/gobindata_util.go
Generated bindata file : 11536 ../../..//test/e2e/generated/bindata.go lines of lovely automated artifacts
+++ [0804 16:04:30] Building the toolchain targets:
    k8s.io/kubernetes/hack/cmd/teststale
+++ [0804 16:04:31] Building go targets for linux/amd64:
    cmd/libs/go2idl/deepcopy-gen
```
